author: FourFourTwo
description: The FA Cup final could be Diego Costa's final match for Chelsea. If it is, he will leave a bittersweet legacy.
title: The curious case of Costa - how Diego will be remembered if he leaves Chelsea

description: Diego Costa’s team-mates have given up speculating where the striker might be playing next season.
title: Chelsea's Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde: The inside story of Diego Costa's tantrums with team-mates and uncertain future

author: FourFourTwo
description: Diego Costa's potential move to the CSL has hit a snag following new rules introduced by the CFA.
title: Chinese FA cracks down on soaring transfer fees to place Costa deal in doubt
